attributes.action: Make sure that any increases in tax and utility bills are in proportion with yearly wage increases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prices for bills and services are increasing more each year than is our capacity to pay each year. Families, pensioners and students are suffering. We are spending a larger and larger chunk of what we work hard for on paying for these increases. Can we see some relief and some reductions please without cuts to services?
